response.overview: The film explores the concepts of inner liberation and freedom in greater depth and uses a holistic approach to Ukrainian folk traditions in a more complex and harmonious sound, minimalist melodies, and rich polyphony to express sincere emotions. It is a journey from meditative introspection to moments of intense sonic expression and polyrhythmic aggression. It is a connection to the native land through emotional sonic steppes, it is resistance to light. "Truth" expresses the quiet truth that lies in the heart.
response.title: Truth
